title: Legendary Jazz Producer Orrin Keepnews Dies At 91
teaser: Jazz producer and record label found Orrin Keepnews died on Sunday at the age of 91. Keepnews was behind landmark recordings by jazz legends like Thelonious Monk, Bill Evans and Cannonball Adderley.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
